    • Method Detail

      • changeURL

        public boolean changeURL(java.lang.String urlString,
                ConnectionToFirefoxInstance.WrapperType theWrapper,
                int frameNumber)
                  throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Change the URL that is showing now
        Parameters:
        urlString - The URL that this instance should show now.
        theWrapper - What kind of wrapper page shall this be? Normal, ticker-tape or none ("none" is really not going to work)
        frameNumber - The frame number to which this content is targeted
        Returns:
        Was the change successful?
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - -- if the url we have been given is bogus
